attributes.action: Increase sentencing for sexual assault cases.
attributes.additional_details:
The sentence for drug use is up to 7 years and the average sentence for sexual assault is also 7 years.
This is not a fair consequence as drug use only affects the person doing the drugs whereas sexual assault affects the victim for possibly their whole life and their family.
Also a sexual assault victim could be so affected by it that it could lead to  self harm.
With these signatures we will hopefully be able to make a change in the sentencing system.
attributes.background: The consequences of sexual assault aren't severe enough considering the crime affects other people a lot. The government and Parliament should discuss this issue and consider increasing the sentence for sexual assault.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608804
